name: Ancient Alpha Demo.
description:
Quell the growing hoard before it gets out of hand.

Still to do:
Create a differnet display to allow animations to play between events.
implement animations to disambiguate events
Fix resolutions other than 1080p
Implement progression,(additional encounters will play after you successfully defeat the Rioters. they will unlock new cards.)

Tips:
Click cards to play them. You may use abilities on resources any number of times. Tune your deck to more easily deal with the enemies.

Currently resolutions other than 1080p are not supported. If they work that's great I haven't tested them all and most of them likely don't display properly. It's likely going to come out in the wash when I update the graphics from UI elements and remove the direction connection from the logic from to the visual representation.

N.B.
Bug reporting is extremely welcome, I want to know if something weird is going on I haven't noticed. Please let me know in the comments. Thanks for taking the time to give it some feedback.
